firmwares.changelog: Fix some known bugs.

Fixes the connection issue among some Samsung phones.
- Adjusts the screen-on time and vibration of event reminder to 30 seconds.
Introducing PAI: PAI is a personalized indicator for individuals' activity intensity, which can be calculated if you turn on 1 minute automatic heart rate detection or heart health detection.
Fix some known bugs

Amazfit GTS 2e
- Fix some known bugs###summary###- Fix some known bugs
Fix some known bugs###summary###- Fix some known bugs

Add watch languages: Finnish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish.
- 8 app alerts added to iOS: WhatsApp, YouTube, TikTok, Gmail, Mijia, QQ Mail, Douyin, DiDi.
###summary###- Add watch languages: Finnish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish.

Amazon Alexa support is available on your watch if your region supports the Amazon Alexa service. Amazon Alexa support is available in the United States, United Kingdom, Ireland, New Zealand, Canada, Germany, Austria, India, Japan, Australia, France, Italy, Spain, Mexico, and Brazil.###summary###- Amazon Alexa.
Optimized heart rate measurement accuracy.###summary###- Optimized heart rate measurement accuracy.

Fixes the issue that the workout data is not displayed in the Do Not Disturb mode.
- Stability of Raise to Activate in sensitive mode improved.

- Stability of Raise to Activate in sensitive mode improved.

Supports up to 87 workout modes.

The watch face automatically updates position over time.

- Improved off-wrist recognition speed.

Welcome to the Amazfit Bip U 

[Exercise] Support for more than 60 sports modes.

[Health] Support for various health functions such as SpO2 detection, heart rate monitoring, stress monitoring, cycle tracking, sleep monitoring, and respiratory training.

[Tool] Support for various functions such as alarms, timer, world clock, Pomodoro, phone music control, and remote camera control.

Welcome to the Amazfit Bip U 

[Exercise] Support for more than 60 sports modes.

[Health] Support for various health functions such as SpO2 detection, heart rate monitoring, stress monitoring, cycle tracking, sleep monitoring, and respiratory training.

[Tool] Support for various functions such as alarms, timer, world clock, Pomodoro, phone music control, and remote camera control.

Welcome to the Amazfit Pop.
Ensure that the phone screen remains on while upgrading.

[Exercise] Support for more than 60 sports modes.

[Health] Support for various health functions such as SpO2 detection, heart rate monitoring, stress monitoring, cycle tracking, sleep monitoring, and respiratory training.

[Tool] Support for various functions such as alarms, timer, world clock, card packages, Alipay, Pomodoro, phone music control, and remote camera control.
Fix known bugs and improve system experience.
